tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V2.1 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Joe and Rachel try to uncover a drug-smuggling ring, and Gina makes a new friend in her antenatal class - but is this one friend she could do without? And when Bernie's hearse is out of action, Peggy spots a gap in the market(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Murder mystery series about a sleuthing writer. Jessica sets out to prove the innocence of her neighbour and friend Daniel O'Brien, an eccentric inventor, when he is accused of the murder of a former partner with one of his inventions(n)

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Comedy drama series about a GP who relocates to the sleepy Cornish hamlet of Portwenn. An old flame of Joan's sails back into her life and sweeps her off her feet, then Martin discovers that the man is seriously ill. Schoolgirl Melanie develops a crush on the doctor and Martin fears her father's wrath when she keeps showing up at the surgery. There is romance in the air for Al and Elaine(n)

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Comedy-drama series. Martin does not take kindly to the influx of holidaymakers in Portwenn - and his attempts to point out the dangers of sunbathing to one woman does not go over very well. Gossip spreads about Martin's phobia of blood and he becomes the subject of a practical joke in the pub. One of Louisa's pupils has an accident and an ambulance has to be called to take him to Truro for emergency treatment. On the way there, Martin reveals the reason behind his fear(n)

programme.title: DCI Banks
programme.desc: Return of the gritty detective series based on the novels by Peter Robinson. A man and a woman claiming to be social workers come to Katy Heath's house and tell her that they need to take her son Kyle away. Katy complies, but when the boy fails to reappear and the couple prove to be unknown to social services, DCI Alan Banks is drawn into a full-scale search for the child(n)

programme.title: DCI Banks
programme.desc: Gritty detective series based on the novels by Peter Robinson. When the body on the moors is identified as 11-year-old Andre Petri, the team have a murder enquiry on their hands. Kyle Heath is still missing and Banks wonders if there is a connection between Andre's death and Kyle's disappearance(n)

programme.title: Scott and Bailey
programme.desc: Sean surprises Rachel when he tells her that he has been in contact with her estranged mother, who would love to see her. Unable to accept that Janet has ended their affair, Andy punishes her by keeping her out of the heart of the investigation, leading to a painful row. Meanwhile, the team look into the murder of Leon Foster; Leon's death looks like a typical gang killing at first, but the discovery that he was sexually mutilated raises suspicions that this could be a domestic murder(n)

programme.title: Scott and Bailey
programme.desc: A hungover Rachel learns that Nick Savage has been brutally assaulted and that she is top of the list of suspects. Scared and unable to remember what happened, she struggles to convince herself that she did not do it. Meanwhile, thinking that she has made her peace with Andy, Janet is shocked to discover that he has given her misinformation which causes Gill to miss an appointment with the coroner. At the same time, Gill re-opens an accidental death case after some new information emerges(n)

programme.title: ITV3 Nightscreen
programme.desc: Text-based information service(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: The Police let Jack and Jim off and PC Nailor buys the bike for 800 pounds. Alec tells Nigel that the changes to the Rovers are off. Bet is delighted. Mr Simpson the estate agent tells Deirdre that the buyer is offering 30,000 pounds for Number one(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Jenny demands that Rod leaves but he charms her round, Rita is curious about Rod staying. Rita tells Jenny that Rod fancies Flick. Deirdre tells the estate agent that she doesn't want to sell the house until she knows who has made the offer(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Joe and Rachel try to uncover a drug-smuggling ring, and Gina makes a new friend in her antenatal class - but is this one friend she could do without? And when Bernie's hearse is out of action, Peggy spots a gap in the market(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Nostalgic medical drama spin-off from Heartbeat. Harper gets a shock after Ken discovers his plans. Mr Rose takes drastic action when a patient has a brain haemorrhage, and Sister Brigid performs a miracle(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: The Emmy nominated reality courtroom series, presided over by outspoken family court judge, Judge Judith Sheindlin, invites viewers into the courtroom to witness hard-hitting and compelling disputes between real litigants. Judge Judy is a show about family court cases, marital dissensions and small claims disputes(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: The Emmy nominated reality courtroom series, presided over by outspoken family court judge, Judge Judith Sheindlin, invites viewers into the courtroom to witness hard-hitting and compelling disputes between real litigants. Judge Judy is a show about family court cases, marital dissensions and small claims disputes(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: The Emmy nominated reality courtroom series, presided over by outspoken family court judge, Judge Judith Sheindlin, invites viewers into the courtroom to witness hard-hitting and compelling disputes between real litigants. Judge Judy is a show about family court cases, marital dissensions and small claims disputes(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Another case for the Belgian detective. Fourteen years after the murder of renowned painter Amyas Crale, whose wife Caroline was hanged for the crime, their grown-up daughter Lucy presents Poirot with a letter written by her mother declaring her innocence(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Nostalgic medical drama spin-off from Heartbeat. Ormerod has to make a decision about Caroline. Weatherill's patient is determined to keep details of her illness a secret. A married couple face the truth about their future. Ken's organisational skills ensure that the hospital ball goes off with a bang(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Joe shows Geoff how to control a violent outbreak at the bookmakers. The police investigate a debt collector who is an ex-convict. Peggy struggles to encourage David to go to a school reunion(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Deirdre doesn't tell Alec and Bet about the Brewery's plans. Jenny and Flick realise neither of them fancy Rod. Derek catches sight of a naked Steph. Deirdre tells Nigel she's not interested in selling but he offers to pay her 35,000 pounds(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Vera plans a second honeymoon. Mavis discovers Derek looking up to Steph's bedroom and finds out she walks about in the nude. Mark threatens Rod with violence unless he leaves. Tracy overhears Dave inviting Deirdre to move in with him(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Mystery drama with Agatha Christie's famous Belgian detective. Society girl Elinor Carlisle, heiress to the considerable Hunterbury estate, is accused of a double murder. Poirot only has five days to investigate the case before she is hanged(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Joe shows Geoff how to control a violent outbreak at the bookmakers. The police investigate a debt collector who is an ex-convict. Peggy struggles to encourage David to go to a school reunion(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Murder mystery series. Jessica takes her nephew and niece on a day out and is asked to solve the seemingly impossible murder of a wealthy and much-disliked amusement park owner(n)

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Two couples vanish without trace from the village of Monks Barton, amid rumours of witchcraft and haunted woods. Flamboyant psychic Cyrus LeVanu clashes with pompous cleric Wallace Stone as a body is found, while other villagers seem to be caught up in a stolen antiques racket. Can Barnaby and Jones discover the secret of Barton Woods and find the killer?(n)

programme.title: Scott and Bailey
programme.desc: Return of the drama series following two Manchester police officers. Newly-wed Rachel struggles to adjust to living with Sean. Admitting their marriage is over, Janet and Ade put their house on the market, planning to split when it sells. When she is called to a crime scene, Janet discovers the severed head of 75-year-old Eunice Bevan at the bottom of the stairs in her home(n)

programme.title: Scott and Bailey
programme.desc: Drama series following two Manchester police officers. The story flashes back to the events of last year, when Rachel found herself implicated as the brains behind the attack on Nick Savage. The Police Complaints Commission pick up the baton, and Rachel is once again under scrutiny. Struggling to cope, she finds comfort in the ever-faithful Sean and agrees to marry him. Amid the wedding celebrations Janet and Ade admit defeat about their marriage(n)

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: Frost has to deal with a hit and run accident involving the son of an MP and a missing Police officer following a casino robbery on the same night(n)

programme.desc: Text-based information service(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Mystery drama with Agatha Christie's famous Belgian detective. Society girl Elinor Carlisle, heiress to the considerable Hunterbury estate, is accused of a double murder. Poirot only has five days to investigate the case before she is hanged(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Nostalgic medical drama spin-off from Heartbeat. A new nurse arrives at the Royal and makes an immediate impact, while Ken and Alun cope with a farming family in trouble and Lizzie's crash diet has disastrous consequences(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: After an explosion in the woods, rumours spread that a meteorite has landed in Aidensfield, but Miller and Rachel have other ideas, and Joe goes undercover to find out more. Meanwhile, Peggy sees commercial possibilities in the sudden interest in outer space(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Mark tells Kevin that the girls threw him out. Flick apologises to Mark for throwing him out. Ivy tells Vera that she's thinking of applying for the job as supervisor. Tracy tells Ken that Deirdre is moving in with Dave(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Ken tells Deirdre she'll be setting Tracy a bad example if she moves in with Dave. Mike refuses to give Ivy a reference because of the travel bags. Curly and Kim plan a romantic evening but Vera plays gooseberry(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Socialite Lady Lucy Angkatell worries about her family guests arriving for the weekend, because they all loathe each other. She invites Hercule Poirot as a distraction, but he soon finds himself at work when philanderer John Christow is discovered dying by the swimming pool, with his wife holding a gun. But who shot him? It is not long before Poirot realises that he is up against one of his trickiest adversaries yet(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: After an explosion in the woods, rumours spread that a meteorite has landed in Aidensfield, but Miller and Rachel have other ideas, and Joe goes undercover to find out more. Meanwhile, Peggy sees commercial possibilities in the sudden interest in outer space(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Another adventure for the sleuthing mystery writer. Jessica helps solve the backstage murder of a young dancer when she attends a special presentation of the famous Rostov Ballet(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Poirot attends a dinner party hosted by his friend, retired actor Sir Charles Cartwright, and finds himself a witness to murder. A local clergyman chokes to death on his cocktail, but Poirot cannot determine how foul play occurred, since almost any one of the guests might have taken the lethal glass. He cannot find a trace of poison or an obvious motive for murder among the guests, who include an enigmatic ingenue, an inquisitive playwright and doctor Sir Bartholomew Strange(n)

programme.title: The Street
programme.desc: Award-winning drama series from acclaimed writer Jimmy McGovern. As injured soldier Private Nick Calshaw returns from Afghanistan, his family are preparing a welcome home party on the street. When he emerges from the taxi outside his family home, the full extent of his facial disfigurement is revealed to his shocked parents and sister, but in spite of being surrounded by those who love him, Nick becomes increasingly depressed and withdrawn as he struggles to deal with a haunting memory(n)

programme.title: The Street
programme.desc: Award-winning drama series from acclaimed writer Jimmy McGovern. Bigoted and cantankerous head chef Kieran Corrigan has had enough of foreign workers flooding into this country; if anyone can stand to listen to him, he is ready to give his ignorant racist diatribe. According to Kieran, the Polish cannot speak English properly and the bus drivers do not know their routes, but when a house fire brings a beautiful Polish woman into his life, Kieran valiantly offers her a roof over her head(n)

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: When an Oxford housewife is found hanged in her home, Lewis and Hathaway unearth a far darker case than the initial suicide verdict suggests(n)

programme.desc: Text-based information service(n)

programme.desc: Shopping from home(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: Socialite Lady Lucy Angkatell worries about her family guests arriving for the weekend, because they all loathe each other. It is not long before Poirot realises that he is up against one of his trickiest adversaries yet(n)

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Nostalgic medical drama series. Serious allegations are made against staff at The Royal, and there's more trouble when a suspected drunk driver is brought in(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A veteran pop manager decides that the Aidensfield Arms will be the location for his wedding reception. Oscar suspects that something is up and when he is found dead, investigations show that he may have been murdered. Peggy is caught with stolen goods, causing her to suddenly suffer from memory loss(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: Bet and Alec are getting worked up about the possibility of Deirdre selling out to Newton and Ridley. Ivy gets her reference from Mike and gets the supervisor's job at Ingrams. Mark's still trying unsuccessfully to get Flick to go out with him(n)

programme.title: Classic Coronation Street
programme.desc: When Alec appeals for support against the brewery, Percy promises immediate action. Kimberley is planning a night in with Curly, but she's already regretting her decision to go against her principles(n)

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: While holidaying on a Nile cruise ship, Hercule Poirot is asked to investigate the death of a honeymooning heiress who stole her best friend's fiance. She had also crossed most of the other passengers at some time in the past - giving them all a motive for murder(n)

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: A veteran pop manager decides that the Aidensfield Arms will be the location for his wedding reception. Oscar suspects that something is up and when he is found dead, investigations show that he may have been murdered. Peggy is caught with stolen goods, causing her to suddenly suffer from memory loss(n)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Murder mystery series. A flamboyant hypnotist is stabbed in the back behind locked and guarded doors in front of an audience of journalists he had placed in a trance(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Crime drama series. DCI Vera Stanhope is called to the University of Northumberland when Jamie Marshall - a young and promising journalism student - plummets to his death from the top of a disused faculty building. Vera's investigation delves further into Jamie's academic and personal life as it becomes apparent that all is not as it seems. In writing part-time for the local newspaper, could this bright and popular student have made enemies that would want to silence him?(n)

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: When a maintenance engineer is found dead in the basement of the Bodleian Library, Lewis and Hathaway investigate a link between the murder and an intruder at a local professor's home earlier in the night. Suspicion grows when they visit the engineer's house and discover rare nineteenth-century books, which were taken from the library in which he worked(n)

programme.title: The Good Karma Hospital
programme.desc: Medical drama series set in tropical southern India. As Holi festival fever hits the Good Karma Hospital, an abandoned baby strikes a personal chord with Ruby. Meanwhile, Lydia is reacquainted with an ageing ex-pat artist whose alternative life choices may be about to catch up with him(n)

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: 60s style action adventure, with the bowler-hatted sleuth Steed and a slinky succession of glamorous female sidekicks. All clues point to notorious foreign agent Boris Kartovski when secret agents start being murdered. The only problem is that Steed killed Kartovski five years ago(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Reality series. Over in Hemet, Brandi struggles to focus Jarrod on the auctions. Elsewhere, Dan and Laura Dotson find themselves facing a deadly scenario(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Reality series. While Ivy makes a splash in Montclair, Brandi has a bone to pick with a hungover Jarrod(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The guys feast their eyes on a street-legal pirate ship parade float and a fantastic World War II bomber jacket that's survived 29 missions, including D-Day(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Corey and Chumlee go looney over a Bugs Bunny poster signed by voice of Bugs, Mel Blanc. The guys also get the chance to buy a golf club owned by Dean Martin(n)

programme.title: Our Everest Challenge with Ben Fogle and Victoria Pendleton
programme.desc: Ben Fogle and Victoria Pendleton attempt to scale the world's highest peak(n)

programme.title: Benidorm
programme.desc: A previously unobserved religious festival means no fun or alcohol is to be had anywhere in Benidorm(n)

programme.title: Better Late Than Never
programme.desc: The guys head to Africa, where William Shatner organises a desert trek in Morocco. They also visit a local market and enjoy a special dinner together(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: Aspiring hip-hop artist Jimmy views his home, Detroit's 8 Mile district, as a psychological line that separates him from where and who he wants to be. As he struggles to make a name for himself, he discovers both friends and foes alike only make his journey harder(n)

programme.title: FYI Daily
programme.desc: Latest news from the world of entertainment(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile

programme.title: Motorsport UK
programme.desc: Richard John Neil presents from Rockingham, with action from Round 18 of the Ginetta Juniors and Round 14 of the Renault Clio Cup UK(n)

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Crime drama series. The team agree to assist with investigations into a plot to overthrow the government of a Mediterranean island. They are joined by Jim Palmer, another member of the organisation - and Caroline's ex. Caroline goes along with Palmer's suspicions that businessman Adam Markos is the man behind the plot, and evidence mounts against him when arms are discovered during raids on his nightclubs, but Harry pursues his own investigation and soon learns the identity of the true culprit(n)

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: An eyewitness to a brutal bombing is unwilling to talk. The man, a police informant, suddenly disappears when Kojak attempts to confront him(n)

programme.title: Quincy, M.E.
programme.desc: Crime drama. The discovery of a skull in the desert uncovers a world of violent secrets and threats(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Comedy drama series. Arthur's latest flight of fancy takes him into the world of darts, but has he hit the bullseye with Welsh wizard Dafydd?(n)

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: The Saint is persuaded to follow a defecting civil servant who has been tricked into smuggling secret papers to East Germany(n)

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: 60s style action adventure, with the bowler-hatted sleuth Steed and a slinky succession of glamorous female sidekicks. programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: A scheming private investigator attempts to cash in on a client's suicide with an insidious plot to defraud the dead man's insurance company(n)

programme.title: Quincy, M.E.
programme.desc: Tensions rise when Quincy performs an autopsy on Sam's cousin, ignoring the strict beliefs of Buddhism(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Comedy drama series about a roguish entrepreneur and his bodyguard. Terry is left minding the fort when Arthur is called up for jury service(n)

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Suave freelance troubleshooter Simon Templar embarks on another adventure. The Saint joins the hunt for a Nazi war criminal living in South America(n)

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: 60s style action adventure, with the bowler-hatted sleuth Steed and a slinky succession of glamorous female sidekicks. Two Russian spies escape from the prison Oldhill Monastery, with the help of some lizard vodka, and eliminate their targets. The third is about to escape as well and his target is Steed(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Reality series. Jarrod and Brandi are determined not to let Dave distract them from a good score while Darrell wants to find out more about the elusive Mogul(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Reality series. Darrell and Brandon are made up when they return to their West Covina hotspot, but Dave is the one to strike gold(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Chumlee shares his top tips for running a pawn business with eager security guard Antwan. Plus, a rare WWII bombsight turns up at the shop(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A man comes in touting a gambling set, complete with knife and pistol for when the going gets rough. Later, Chumlee questions the value of a Snoop Dogg doll(n)

programme.title: World Superbike Highlights
programme.desc: Best bits from Round 10 - the Nolan Portuguese Round at Algarve International Circuit(n)

programme.title: Firefox
programme.desc: Cold War-era action-adventure starring Clint Eastwood, 1982. A pilot is sent on a top-secret mission into the Soviet Union to steal a hi-tech prototype jet fighter(n)

programme.desc: Latest news from the world of entertainment(n)

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade travels to Germany, where he meets victims of a beast seen raising its snout above the surface of freshwaters in Europe for the past 700 years(n)

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade investigates a fatal incident in Alaska's remote wilderness where fishermen have vanished without trace - is an unidentified killer at large?(n)

programme.title: Minder
programme.desc: Comedy drama series about a roguish entrepreneur and his bodyguard. Terry is left minding the fort when Arthur is called up for jury service(n)

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Crime drama series. The Protectors are engaged by the wife of a foreign president to safeguard her husband when he arrives in the Mediterranean for medical treatment. Hiring a double of the president, and with Caroline masquerading as his wife, Harry arranges an elaborate deception at the airport to fool the president's enemies - allowing the real president to be smuggled to safety. But the plan is foiled when the president's ambulance is ambushed and the abductors escape with him to sea(n)

programme.title: Ax Men
programme.desc: Reality series following lumberjacks at work. The Chapman crew pull an all-nighter to catch up on the log count, and Shelby finds himself in trouble with the law(n)

Two Russian spies escape from the prison Oldhill Monastery, with the help of some lizard vodka, and eliminate their targets. The third is about to escape as well and his target is Steed(n)

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Crime drama series. The team agree to assist with investigations into a plot to overthrow the government of a Mediterranean island. They are joined by Jim Palmer, another member of the organisation - and Caroline's ex. Caroline goes along with Palmer's suspicions that businessman Adam Markos is the man behind the plot, and evidence mounts against him when arms are discovered during raids on his nightclubs, but Harry pursues his own investigation and soon learns the identity of the true culprit(n)

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: 60s style action adventure, with the bowler-hatted sleuth Steed and a slinky succession of glamorous female sidekicks. When Mrs. Peel's friend Major Croft goes missing, she traces him to the picture postcard village of Little Storping. Unfortunately the entire population are assassins for hire who lure their victims to the village, kill them and then claim that they have never been there. Croft has been killed, along with his valet to prevent them from exposing the sinister secret and Mrs. Peel is next on the hit list unless Steed can save her(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Documentary series. Fierce competition greets Rene and Casey as they return to the auctions. Dave unearths a fantastic piece of board game history(n)

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Reality series. Darrell and Brandon are optimistic as they return to the scene of their biggest score, while the others take on the self-proclaimed King of Montebello(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The team prepares to fight for a good price on a Cold War fighter jet and ponders the value of a bat and glove signed by 'Sultan of Swat' Babe Ruth(n)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Staff at the pawn shop ponder the value of a 1940s' mandolin. They also come across a signed print of Abraham Lincoln. But can they trust its authenticity?(n)

programme.title: The Chase: Celebrity Special
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four celebrities take on the challenge of trying to outwit the Chaser. TV host Gregg Wallace, Olympic champion Denise Lewis, sports presenter Mark Pougatch and comedian Gina Yashere come together to work as a team in the hope of winning thousands of pounds for their charities(n)

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Although working-class Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa lost his high-profile bout with the cocky world champion Apollo Creed, his Cinderella story caught the national sports media's attention, and he now has the opportunity to capitalise on his sudden fame. Meanwhile, Creed is still smarting from nearly losing to some fighter no one has ever heard of, and arrogantly prods his newfound nemesis into getting back into the ring(n)
